recipe_name: Baby Back Ribs with Papaya Sauce
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, minced, 1 cup papaya - peeled, seeded and cubed,   +   1/2 cup water,   +   1/2 cup white wine,   +   1/2 cup honey,   +   1/4 cup tomato paste, 4 pounds pork spareribs
nutrition: Total Fat 60g 77%, Saturated Fat 22g 111%, Cholesterol 240mg 80%, Sodium 319mg 14%, Total Carbohydrate 43g 15%, Dietary Fiber 1g 5%, Total Sugars 39g, Protein 59g, Vitamin C 26mg 129%, Calcium 115mg 9%, Iron 5mg 25%, Potassium 938mg 20%
